name: [vt] Dev Utils
tagline: helpful functions and utilities for OXID developers
body: # functions: * user-friendly interface * clearing particular caches * or all cache at once * displaying active controller class and its main template for easy finding files and templates * you can keep your basket after last checkout step and easily re-send order confirmation email * all the debugging options and cache clearing functions can be accessed from shop frontend and backend * displaying last entries for shop's exception log and webserver error log * a scratchbook for testing some php and shop functions, you can access the whole shop framework for quick testing # installation: ## getting the module * download the zip * extract it * copy the contents of the "copy_this" folder into the shop root directory * if you use a ftp client, make sure you set it to use binaty mode to transfer files * if you are familar with git and shell you can checkout the module branch: ``` $ cd *your_shop_root*/modules/ $ git clone -b module git://github.com/vanilla-thunder/vt-devutils.git ``` ## activation and configuration * log into the OXID backend and got to extensions->modules * activate "vt DevUtils * switch to the settings tab and configure the logs. you can set absolute or relative path * now press F5 and you will see a new symbol in bottom left corner * you will have the same interface in shop frontend if you are logged in with an administrator account # got problems or questions? please use one of this threads in OXID Community Forum: international (english): http://forum.oxid-esales.com/showthread.php?p=125821 german: http://forum.oxid-esales.com/showthread.php?p=125820 russian: -coming soon- # license ## vt-devutils Module for OXID eShop 4.7 Copyright (c) 2012-2013 Marat Bedoev This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
